power.title: Bane
power.fluff: You lay a divine curse upon your foe that shrouds it in enervating shadows

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to attack rolls and all defenses until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals 1 + your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: One-half the penalty.

power.title: Cause Fear
power.fluff: Your holy symbol ignites with the fury of your god, and uncontrollable terror grips your enemy, causing it to instantly recoil

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target must take a free reaction to move as far away from you as it can, moving a number of squares equal to its speed + your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Crit:
section.text: Add your implement's enhancement bonus to the number of squares the target must move.
The target avoids hindering and difficult terrain if it can. This movement is not considered forced movement, so it provokes opportunity attacks.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Divine Glow
power.fluff: With a quick prayer, you invoke a blast of white radiance from your holy symbol, the start light burning foes while your allies are heartened and guided by it

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each ally in the blast gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Dread Revelation
power.fluff: Your attack discourages your foe from confronting you and your companions

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you can push the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The first time before the end of your next turn, when the target willingly enters a square adjacent to you or any of your allies, it takes psychic damage equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Enforced Serenity
power.fluff: You assault your foe's mind, disrupting its counterattack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d4 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is weakened until the start of your next turn.

power.title: Exacting Utterance
power.fluff: The suffering of your enemy instills your comrades with righteous vigor

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains vulnerable all equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, any ally that attacks the target gains temporary hit points after the attack has been resolved. The temporary hit points equal 2 + your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Faerie-Flame Strike
power.fluff: Your weapon becomes limned in purple fire that leaps upon your foe, revealing its every move

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot benefit from any concealment and cannot become hidden.

power.title: Healing Strike
power.fluff: You call out your god's might to your enemy as you strike, challenging the foe while bestowing a minor blessing of healing upon yourself or an ally

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you can mark the target until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose you or one ally within 5 squares of you. The chosen character can spend a healing surge to regain hit points. The hit points regained equal the chosen character's healing surge value, or one-half his or her healing surge value if your attack was a miss.

power.title: Inevitable Doom
power.fluff: You tap into the threads of fate that surround an enemy, so that the next assault against that foe will hasten it to the grave

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The next attack made against the target before the end of your next turn deals +2d8 extra damage on a hit or a miss.
If the attack does not normally deal damage on a miss, it still deals 2d8 damage, though does not benefit from bonuses to damage rolls.

power.title: Mighty Hew
power.fluff: Your mighty strike prevents a foe from making an effective attack

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within your reach hits an ally with an attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals half damage to the triggering ally.

power.title: Numinous Shield
power.fluff: Divine radiance blazes from you as you strike your foe, forming a halo of protection about you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You create a zone in a close burst 2 until the end of your next turn.
While in the zone, you and allies gain a +2 power bonus to AC.

power.title: Prophetic Guidance
power.fluff: A glimpse into your enemy's future allows you to guide your allies' attacks with incredible precision

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The following effects apply until the end of your next turn:
The target grants combat advantage.
Your allies gain a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Wisdom modifier.
The first ally that misses the target can choose to reroll the attack.

power.title: Ringing Blow
power.fluff: Your thundering attack serves as a clarion call for your allies to act in concert

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier thunder damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, each ally who makes an attack against the target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of his or her following turn.

power.title: Shield Bearer
power.fluff: A shimmering warrior steps from between the worlds to defend your allies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a Medium shield bearer in an unoccupied square adjacent to the primary target. The shield bearer occupies its square, and it lasts until the end of your next turn. Your allies can move through the square occupied by the shield bearer.
While adjacent to the shield bearer, you and allies gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses.
Martial allies can treat the shield bearer as an ally for flanking.
You make the Shield Bearer's Strike attack, using the shield bearer as the point of origin.

section.name: Special:
section.text: This counts as a Weapon attack instead of an Implement attack for creatures other than you.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

power.title: Sun Burst
power.fluff: Light erupts from your weapon, scalding your foe while your allies draw strength from the brilliant glow

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You and each ally within 5 squares of you gain temporary hit points, and can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. The temporary hit points equal 4 + your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Sundering Might
power.fluff: You cloak your weapon in divine power and slam your foe, revealing a gap in its defenses that your allies can use

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must use this power with a simple weapon.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier +3 damage, or +6 damage if you wield your weapon in two hands.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 3 (Divine) until the end of your next turn.
You and allies in the aura, when making an attack against the target, can choose to make the attack against the lowest defense instead of the defense normally targeted by the attack.

power.title: Thought Twister
power.fluff: You ask your god to bless your action as you swing your weapon, hoping to knock some sense into your enemy

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

power.title: Thundering Steel
power.fluff: With a prayer to the storm god, you imbue your weapon with the power of thunder that rumbles across the battlefield as you strike

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier thunder damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each time you or an ally hits the target before the start of your next turn, the target takes additional thunder damage equal to your Strength modifier.

power.title: Vengeful Flare
power.fluff: Seeing your ally in pain, you vow vengeance as you rain holy fire upon your foe

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex
If the target has bloodied an ally or dealt damage to a bloodied ally since the end of your last turn, you have combat advantage on this attack

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier fire damage.

If you have used a Divine Healing power during your current turn, this attack deals additional damage equal to your Charisma modifier and the damage is radiant and fire, with the power gaining the Radiant keyword.

power.title: War Priest's Strike
power.fluff: You smite your foe, crushing its armor and leaving a glowing rune that guides your allies' attacks

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Wisdom modifiet radiant damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Wrathful Thunder
power.fluff: Calling upon the divine anger of your god, you bring forth a thunderclap that dazes your foe

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
